Package Players

Class Player

java.lang.Object
Players.Player
public class Player extends Object
This class represents a Player. It represents a player within the game.
Author:
Jerry and Julian

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(String username, ArrayList<Bullet> in, ArrayList<Bullet> out, ArrayList<Integer> powrUpList, String uniqueID, Collider cl, float xS, float yS, float x, float y, processing.core.PApplet pa, Weapon w, double vision, double speed, double health, processing.core.PImage[] images, int tileSize)
      Creates a new instance of a Player object
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player object
      in - The ArrayList of incoming bullets
      out - The ArrayList of outgoing bullets
      powrUpList - The ArrayList of power ups
      uniqueID - The uniqueID of the player
      cl - The collider of the object
      xS - The x location of the object on the screen
      yS - The y location of the object on the screen
      x - The x location of the player on the world
      y - The y location of the player on the world
      pa - PApplet surface to draw on
      w - Weapon of the player
      vision - Vision of the player
      speed - Speed of the player
      health - Health of the player
      images - Images of the player (animations)
      tileSize - Size of the tiles

    • Player

      public Player​(String username, float xS, float yS, float xW, float yW, processing.core.PApplet pa, processing.core.PImage[] images, int tileSize)
      Creates a new instance of a Player object
      Parameters:
      username - The unique ID of the player object
      xS - The x coordinate of the player in teh screen
      yS - The y coordinate of the player in the screen
      xW - The x coordinate of the player in the world
      yW - The y coordinate of the player in the world
      pa - The PApplet surface to drawn on
      images - The images of the player (animations)
      tileSize - The tile size of the tiles

    • Player

      public Player​(String uniqueID, PlayerData data, processing.core.PApplet p, processing.core.PImage[] images, Collider c, int tileSize, TileManager tM)
      Creates a new instance of a Player object
      Parameters:
      uniqueID - The unique ID of the player object
      data - The data of the current player
      p - The PApplet surface that the player will be on
      images - The images of the player (animations)
      c - The collider object which tests for collsiions
      tileSize - The tileSize of the tiles
      tM - The tile manager of the program
